headline: Schlage's Pin & Tumbler™ Studio Unveils the Refined Finishes Collection: A Celebration of Quiet Elegance and Modern Craftsmanship
summary: Schlage, America's Most Trusted Lock Brand¹ and leader in door hardware innovation for over a century, today announced the latest limited release from Pin & Tumbler™ A Studio by Schlage — the Refined Finishes Collection. Designed to elevate everyday spaces with subtle sophistication, the collection introduces three new finishes that embody quiet elegance and refined design.
